snippet.title: Astron Belt (1983 Sega(Midway License))
snippet.description:
A shooting 'em up game where you fly through the universe battling alien ships to make your way to fight the main Alien Battle Cruiser. Along the way, you fly across alien planets, through tunnels, through trenches and get involved in a few astro-dogfights with enemy space fighters.

Released in Japan on May 1983 from Sega and in the US on November 1983 from Midway. 
Astron Belt was not the world's first commercial video game to use a laser disk. That title would go to Quarter Horse by Electro -Sport released in 1982. That game is only in mame but it isn't playable yet.

Emulator: Daphne 1.00v win32
Recorder: Fraps
Editor: Virtual Dub
Encoder: Avisynth + Megui
